evidence_in_dialogue: [[Catherine]] well, those are shoe prints on his face
[[Sara]] he starved to death, didn't he?
[[Sara]] last known residence was a foster home run by a lorna tenney
[[Mr._Mendez]] somebody's boy is in that bed and he's not mine
[[Sofia_Curtis]] your print belongs to an enlisted man, private first class phillip riley
[[Warrick]] ... and one suspect -- vincent mendoza ... booked for meth manufacture
[[Warrick]] your client killed a man in a holding cell and tried to frame the cops for it
